meta.title: FoodChain | Auditable Traceability for the Food Industry
meta.description: Ensure safety and transparency in your supply chain with FoodChain. Real-time traceability, regulatory compliance, and efficient collaboration.
hero.title: Build trust at every stage of your food chain with verified seals in minutes
hero.subtitle: Validate batches with a signed QR, operate with ready-made audits on a public blockchain, and share verifiable evidence with customers and authorities.
hero.secondaryAria: See a live case of FoodChain
sections.problem.title: The problem
sections.problem.description: The food industry faces risks in traceability, safety, and regulatory compliance. Lack of transparency creates distrust and hinders crisis management.
sections.solution.title: Our solution
sections.solution.description: FoodChain records every step of the chain with verifiable real-time evidence. With blockchain, we guarantee immutability, and with a signed QR, we prevent fraud, offering fast and reliable audits.

sections.faq.title: Frequently asked questions
sections.faq.items.1.question: What is FoodChain?
sections.faq.items.1.answer: It digitizes and secures traceability: signed QR codes, blockchain hashes, and public verification.
sections.faq.items.2.question: How does the integration work?
sections.faq.items.2.answer: API and connectors for ERP/CRM. We start with a pilot and role-based onboarding.
sections.faq.items.3.question: What support do you offer?
sections.faq.items.3.answer: Onboarding, help desk, and SLA-backed plans.
